subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5283 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

There seems to be a problem with the tracking number with my order.  Can
you provide an update on my order?

Regards,

Edgar

conversations.body_text: Hi Edgar Lau,  I apologize for the delayed response.Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We shipped your order yesterday and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468703

Hi,

Thank you for the update. I was about to get a refund. I like your products
and brand, I got the plus X pedals and I have been recommending people but
this customer service needs improvement.
I work in the same field and replying with an update even if it is sold out
and asked them to wait helps retain customers and show that you care.

Regards,

Edgar


On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 12:45 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Edgar Lau,     Thank you for choosing our products. We sincerely apologize for the delayed response. Due to a sudden surge in order volume, we were unable to reply promptly, causing you inconvenience. We've confirmed your order has already been shipped, so unfortunately, we cannot process a refund at this time. We deeply regret the inconvenience, dear customer.
